name: 14 Days To Doomsday
description:
You wake up in an empty apartment with no money, no memory, and no idea why you are lacking in the latter two categories. Unbeknownst to you, a force that threatens to destroy the work as you know it lurks. Can you save the world? Do you even want to?

In this short, text-based game, you can explore the magical world of Yofuvi, rebuild your life, adopt a child, investigate the most deadly crime syndicates, and of course, prevent the world from ending.

This game was written in Python (I know, bad decision) and it is my first project, so I apologize for any quality issues.
